#!/bin/sh

PATH=$PATH:/home/app/.local/bin/
export PATH

pip3 install --upgrade pip --user

python3.7 -m pip install  --upgrade pip 

python3.7 -m pip  install -U jsonschema  --user

python3.7 -m pip   install --upgrade  "ipython"  --user
python3.7 -m pip   install --upgrade  "jupyter"  --user
python3.7 -m pip  install --upgrade https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu/torch-1.0.1.post2-cp37-cp37m-linux_x86_64.whl
python3.7 -m pip  install --upgrade torchvision
python3.7 -m pip  install --upgrade flair
   
if ! test -f /home/app/.have_profile
 then
   
   ipython3 profile create nbserver
   touch /home/app/.have_profile
   cd /home/app
  
     if test -f /home/app/modules
      then
       for module in `cat /home/app/modules`
        do
          python3.7 -m pip  install --upgrade  $module --user
        done
     fi

      if ! test -z $pass
       then
        pass=`echo "from IPython.lib import passwd
        passwd('_Engines_Environment(notebook_password)')
        exit() " | ipython3  --no-confirm-exit --no-color-info --no-pprint --colors=NoColor |grep sha1 | sed "/.*sha1/s//\'sha1/"`
        #cat ~/.ipython/profile_nbserver/ipython_notebook_config.py | sed "/^# c.NotebookApp.password.*/s//c.NotebookApp.password=$pass/" > /tmp/confg
        #cp /tmp/confg ~/.ipython/profile_nbserver/ipython_notebook_config.py
        echo -n $pass > /home/app/.pass
        echo -n $notebook_password > /home/app/.notebook_password
     fi    
 else
  if test -f /home/app/.pass
   then
    pass=`cat /home/app/.pass`
  fi    
fi
 if ! test -z $pass
  then
    pass="--NotebookApp.password=$pass 
 fi    
PID_FILE=/tmp/ipython_notebook.pid
export PID_FILE
. /home/engines/functions/system_functions.sh
host=`hostname`
ip=`grep $Hostname /etc/hosts |cut -f1 `
result=`jupyter-notebook   --ip=$ip  &`
#--config ~/.ipython/profile_nbserver/ipython_notebook_config.py
pid=$!

echo $result

echo $result |grep token= > /tmp/first_run_url

echo $pid >$PID_FILE
startup_complete
wait

shutdown_complete

exit

#!/bin/sh

  pass=`echo "from IPython.lib import passwd
  passwd('$notebook_password')
  exit() " | ipython3  --no-confirm-exit --no-color-info --no-pprint --colors=NoColor |grep sha1 | sed "/.*sha/s//\'sha/"`
  cat ~/.ipython/profile_nbserver/ipython_notebook_config.py | sed "/^# c.NotebookApp.password.*/s//c.NotebookApp.password=$pass/" > /tmp/confg
  cp /tmp/confg ~/.ipython/profile_nbserver/ipython_notebook_config.py
 echo -n $pass > /home/app/.pass
  echo -n $notebook_password > /home/app/.notebook_password
